summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue Southwest, from a point approximately 211 feet north of West Oregon Street, to West Juneau Street; by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12340 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
